trans-unit.source: Represents a mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Representa um dispositivo de mouse.

trans-unit.source: The MouseDevice supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: O MouseDevice oferece suporte a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infraestrutura e não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: For mouse related input, use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class.
trans-unit.target: Mouse relacionados de entrada, use a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class represents the mouse to an application and provides methods, properties, and events that reflect the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>classe representa o mouse para um aplicativo e fornece métodos, propriedades e eventos que refletem o estado do mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> que está relatando a entrada para este dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: The source of input for this device.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de entrada para este dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Captures mouse events to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Captura eventos de mouse para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether the cursor is within its borders If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> is not specified, the default <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> is <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>.
trans-unit.target: Quando um elemento captura o mouse, ele recebe entrada do mouse se o cursor está em suas bordas se um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>não for especificado, o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>é <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>

trans-unit.source: To release mouse capture, call Capture passing `null` as the element to capture.
trans-unit.target: Para liberar a captura do mouse, chame captura passando `null` como o elemento para capturar.

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is captured when a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> are raised first.
trans-unit.target: Se o mouse é capturado quando um <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>é gerado e a entrada não for definida para o elemento sob o mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement>são gerados pela primeira vez.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> events are routed.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que o elemento capturado a chance de captura antes de liberar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>eventos são roteados.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: The element to capture the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O elemento captura o mouse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento foi capaz de capturar o mouse; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: element is not a or .
trans-unit.target: elementis not a or .

trans-unit.source: Captures mouse input to the specified element using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Captura de entrada do mouse para o elemento especificado usando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: Quando um elemento captura o mouse, ele recebe entrada do mouse se o cursor estiver em suas bordas ou não.

trans-unit.source: To release mouse capture, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A> passing `null` as the element to capture.
trans-unit.target: Para liberar a captura do mouse, chame <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A>passando `null` como o elemento para capturar.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is captured when a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> are raised first.
trans-unit.target: Se o mouse é capturado quando um <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>é gerado e a entrada não for definida para o elemento sob o mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement>são gerados pela primeira vez.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> events are routed.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que o elemento capturado a chance de captura antes de liberar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>eventos são roteados.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: The element to capture the mouse..
trans-unit.target: O elemento captura o mouse.

trans-unit.source: The capture policy to use.
trans-unit.target: A política de captura a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento foi capaz de capturar o mouse; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: element is not a or .
trans-unit.target: elementis not a or .

trans-unit.source: captureMode is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: captureModenão é válido .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that is captured by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> que é capturado com o mouse.

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: Quando um elemento captura o mouse, ele recebe entrada do mouse se o cursor estiver em suas bordas ou não.

trans-unit.source: The element which is captured by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que é capturado com o mouse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that the mouse pointer is directly over.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento que o ponteiro do mouse está diretamente acima.

trans-unit.source: The mouse is considered directly over an element if the mouse has been captured to that element.
trans-unit.target: O mouse é considerado diretamente através de um elemento, se o mouse foi capturado para esse elemento.

trans-unit.source: Controls can be composed of multiple elements.
trans-unit.target: Controles podem ser compostos de vários elementos.

trans-unit.source: DirectlyOver reports the specific element in the composite control the mouse pointer is over and not the control itself.
trans-unit.target: DirectlyOver informa o elemento específico do controle composto que o ponteiro do mouse está sobre e não o próprio controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, depending on which part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> the pointer is over, the DirectlyOver property could report the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property or the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, dependendo de qual parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>o ponteiro está sobre, a propriedade DirectlyOver poderia relatar a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>propriedade ou <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome>.</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A> property on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> to determine whether the mouse is over an element, which includes its visual child elements or control compositing elements.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>e <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>para determinar se o mouse estiver sobre um elemento, que inclui seus elementos filho de visual ou elementos de composição de controle.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element the mouse pointer is over.
trans-unit.target: O elemento o ponteiro do mouse está sobre.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the specified mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do botão especificado.

trans-unit.source: The button which is being queried.
trans-unit.target: O botão que está sendo consultado.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: O estado do botão.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Calcula a posição do ponteiro do mouse, nas coordenadas do cliente.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A posição do ponteiro do mouse, nas coordenadas do cliente.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates, in the specified <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Calcula a posição do ponteiro do mouse, nas coordenadas do cliente, especificado na <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The source in which to obtain the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: A fonte no qual obter a posição do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates, in the specified <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A posição do ponteiro do mouse, nas coordenadas do cliente, especificado na <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the mouse relative to a specified element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição do mouse em relação a um elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer is calculated relative to the specified <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> with the upper-left corner of element being the point of origin, 0,0.
trans-unit.target: A posição do ponteiro do mouse é calculada relativo especificado <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>com o canto superior esquerdo do elemento a ser o ponto de origem, 0,0.</xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>

trans-unit.source: The frame of reference in which to calculate the position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O quadro de referência no qual calcular a posição do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse relative to the parameter relativeTo.
trans-unit.target: A posição do mouse em relação ao parâmetro relativeTo .

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is or is not a or .
trans-unit.target: relativeTois or is not a or .

trans-unit.source: Calculates the screen position of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Calcula a posição da tela do ponteiro do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: A posição do ponteiro do mouse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the left mouse button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do botão esquerdo do mouse deste dispositivo de mouse.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: O estado do botão.

trans-unit.source: The state of the middle button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: O estado do botão do meio desse dispositivo de mouse.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: O estado do botão.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cursor for the entire application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o cursor para o aplicativo inteiro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> that OverrideCursor is set to will be applied to the whole application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>OverrideCursor definido como serão aplicadas a todo o aplicativo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: To clear the override <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>, set OverrideCursor to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Para limpar a substituição <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>, defina OverrideCursor como `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: Setting OverrideCursor to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A> will force the mouse cursor not to be displayed, but mouse events are still processed.
trans-unit.target: Definindo OverrideCursor como <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A>forçará o cursor do mouse para não ser exibidos, mas os eventos de mouse ainda são processados.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A>

trans-unit.source: The override cursor or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if OverrideCursor is not set.
trans-unit.target: O cursor de substituição ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se OverrideCursor não está definido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the right button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do botão direito deste dispositivo de mouse.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: O estado do botão.

trans-unit.source: Sets the mouse pointer to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Cursor"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Define o ponteiro do mouse especificado<xref href="System.Windows.Input.Cursor"></xref>

trans-unit.source: Note that this cursor does not apply any particular <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, but rather it applies to the whole application.
trans-unit.target: Observe que esse cursor não se aplica a qualquer <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, mas em vez disso, ele se aplica a todo o aplicativo.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The cursor to set the mouse pointer to.
trans-unit.target: O cursor para definir o ponteiro do mouse para.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the mouse cursor is set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o cursor do mouse está definido; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Forces the mouse to resynchronize.
trans-unit.target: Força o mouse para sincronizar novamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice> monitors layout changes and calls Synchronize.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>layout monitores muda e chama Synchronize.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>

trans-unit.source: There are cases in which the mouse input system must be forced to update for it to respond to changes.
trans-unit.target: Há casos em que o sistema de entrada do mouse deve ser forçado a atualizar para responder às alterações.

trans-unit.source: For example, you must resynchronize the mouse on a timer.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você deverá ressincronizar o mouse sobre um timer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that the input from this mouse device is sent to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> enviado para a entrada desse dispositivo de mouse.

trans-unit.source: The target for a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice> is the object the mouse is over or the object with mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: O destino para um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>é o objeto que é o mouse sobre ou o objeto com a captura do mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>

trans-unit.source: The element that receives the input.
trans-unit.target: O elemento que recebe a entrada.

trans-unit.source: Forces the mouse cursor to update.
trans-unit.target: Força o cursor do mouse para atualizar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the first extended button on this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do primeiro botão estendido neste dispositivo de mouse.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: O estado do botão.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the second extended button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do segundo botão estendido deste dispositivo de mouse.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: O estado do botão.
